Shell: 42% cotton/42% nylon/18% polyester. Fabric: Nubby tweed / jersey. Dotted nubby tweed and striped mid-weight jersey bring striking graphic appeal to this chic Thakoon pullover. Slouchy dolman styling accentuates the boxy profile, and asymmetrical panels finish the long sleeves. Crew neckline. Semi-sheer. Description Clothing > Thakoon > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Born in Northern Thailand and raised in Omaha, Nebraska, Thakoon Panichgul incorporates a variety of influences into his eponymous line of clothing, blending ladylike elegance with urban street wear. Panichgul earned a business degree from Boston University and studied at Parsons School of Design before launching his ready-to-wear collection in 2004. Timelessly feminine yet innovative and modern with a playful wit, Thakoon has become a favorite of fashion editors, stylists, and fashion-forward celebrities. Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
